resources.string:
Version 0.1
Made minor UI changes, fixed crashes that were affecting some users, updated licenses.

Version 0.0.9
Fixed crashes that were affecting some users.

Version 0.0.8
Fixed crashes on Android Oreo and above. Notifications are displayed more consistently. Vector drawables are not blurry anymore.

Version 0.0.7
Fixed a bug where the time until the next class was incorrectly displayed on the notification.

Version 0.0.6
Added support for notifications in Android O, fixed the display of reminder notifications while ongoing notifications are shown.

Version 0.0.5
No changelog available for this first version.
